sub_title: Operation Manager/Location Leader at Wipro Limited

school.name: Academia de Studii Economice din București
Academia de Studii Economice din București
Calistrat Hogas High School Piatra Neamt, Romania
Scoala Nationala de Studii Politice si Administrative (SNSPA)

profile_positions.description:
•	Leading the L1 and L2 IT Services accounts for the Wipro Romania and UK Locations
•	Responsible for over ~400 Service Desk IT analysts, trainers, SMEs, TLs, Managers and L2 onsite resolvers, supporting ITIL framework
•	Offer IT L1 and L2 services for industries such as Pharma (3 Top Pharma Companies, as per Forbes Pharma customers), Banking - leasing and financial solutions, Automotive, Retail, Oil & Gas etc. 
•	Responsible for respecting the contractual agreements and level of quality, revenue and hiring, people growth – identify talents, identify new business opportunities and improvement projects, sustain the customer in his initiatives and exceed his expectations throughout expertise and values.
•	Built strong relationships with all business partners which led to reduced timelines and costs of solution or technical deliveries and positive feedback from management
•	Utilising extensive experience on areas like training, testing, change and communication, BPO and understanding of various project methodologies managed to influence solution development and execution, reduce overall implementation timelines, increase visibility on governance and delivery, and improve business perception on IT delivery
•	Decision maker in all stages of a contract: Pre-Sales and Negotiation, SLAs and target agreement, Legal risks and local market, Transition: Design the transition Plan and Lead the team, Hiring: recruiting and interviewing, Human Resources, Deliver the contractual agreements, Monitor performance and evaluate existing contracts
profile_positions.title: Location Manager

profile_positions.description:
•       Responsible for GSD EMEA Region, having as direct reports L1 agents, Event Coordinators, SME’s (process trainers), Team Leaders (following the ITIL Format) in Romania and Philippines – a Service Desk team of ~60 FTEs
•	Customer centricity: Strong relationship with the customer, aligning the goals and understand & anticipate customers' implicit & explicit needs. Meet & exceed customer expectations with a mechanism to continuously improve customer experience – work together as a Business Partner and driving business impact for the customer.
•	Operational Excellence/ Execution: Make sure to meet and exceed all the contractual agreements, helped to stabilize and improve the operational and delivery model (driving Operational excellence through well thought out actions and accountability); Achieve results with speed and integrity; Enhance productivity through continuous improvement and technological solutions; Set a positive example through behaviour and actions.
•	People Leadership: Enable individuals & teams to reach their maximum performance potential through use of feedback, coaching, mentoring and motivational tools. Clearly state the outcomes we want to see but allowing people to find their own ways to meet goals, collaborate with people at all levels to accomplish organizational goals. Demonstrate team work. Understands my team members’ abilities and assign work that complements their strengths and helps them develop new skills.
•	Effective Communication: Positively communicating views, ideas, plans and decisions such that it results in desired action. Communicate at relevant and appropriate forums and use escalation where required. Effective listener using empathy to effectively understand and address issues. Working on building a wide network of relationships across the Organization.
•	Change Advocacy: Know what is required to achieve successful change
profile_positions.title: Operations Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Operation Manager and Team Leader for 2 Top Pharma Companies (as per Forbes); responsible for Italian and English speaking countries, having as direct reports L1, L1.5, L2 IT analysts, IT trainers, vendors - following the ITIL Format
•	Customer relationship: Build a strong professional relation with the customer, adapting the service to the customer needs. Attend meetings, present the desk’s performance. Handle all customer concerns and escalations, drive each issue and project to achieve the best results. Accustomed to analytical thought processes, attended Solution Identification sessions in Spain and Italy in order to identify data for past volumes, staffing levels, application lists, access methods that resulted in establishing a strong relationship between Genpact and the client.
•	Operational Excellence: Monitor the team’s performance, making sure that all Service Level Agreements are met, Handle the operational reviews; Create and update dashboards, presentations; Staffing and Capacity: ensures that the desk is correctly staffed. 
•	People management: Motivate the team, the ability to discern right actions from wrong ones, reward team members who are interested, capable, and exceed expectations, guide, coach and provide help to those who need it, and to sanction those who do not meet the standards; Team Huddles: informing the team about the new rules and enforcing them, company policies opportunities, trainings. The ability to make the team members reach their potential, a good motivator, providing a feeling of trust that enables them to succeed in their tasks/activities.
•	Continuous Improvement: Improving the business through customer satisfaction
•	Finance: Internal administrative functions (Attendance, Billability, Telephone charges, etc). Create/monitor the P&L. Identify business opportunities, price negotiation, create contracts 
•	HR Management
profile_positions.title: Information Technology Team Lead

profile_positions.description: Green Belt and Lean Ace Trained, tested and certified – GB project “MTTR Reduction at L1 SD”
profile_positions.title: Lean Six Sigma

profile_positions.description: •	May – August 2016 – I had the role of Project Manager/ SME during a Re-engineering project in Italy, for a global provider of leasing and financial solutions; responsibilities: Identify global and local process improvement initiatives using Six Sigma methodology (35 Total Kaizen identified during Value stream mapping and brainstorming sessions with an impact of 500K). Helped in implementing various recommendations and played a very important role in Change Management with the "Re-organization of the teams" (Aligning right roles & responsibilities); Organize training sessions, create necessary documents and SOPs, drive/influence change, identify and implement IT system changes, follow-up with the required parts to insure completion; coordinated very well with the management but also built a very good relationship with people on the floor that made it easy for people to collaborate and accept changes
profile_positions.title: Information Technology Consultant

profile_positions.description: SENIOR PROCESS & REPORTING ANALYST for an automotive customer, offerig IT helpdesk support in English, French and Italian languages
profile_positions.title: Senior Process Associate

profile_positions.description: Working for Wind and Enel Italia, we had to establish appointments between our agents in Italy and different companies (existing or perspective clients), in order to revise and renewal our contract or to advertise our services. Italian Language
profile_positions.title: Call Center Operator
